text: akaso ane dharatinum sarjana, rata-divasanum avavum javum, hodinum lokone phayado pahoncadanari vastu'one la'ine samudromam calavum, akasa manthi pani varasavi mrta dharatine jivita kari devi, temam dareka prakarana janavarane phelavi deva, hava'oni disa badalavi ane vadala je akasa ane dharati vacce che temam budhdhisali loko mate allahani nisani'o che
